name: Pluto Kush
description: Pluto may no longer be a planet, but that doesn’t debase the cosmic makeup of this charming indica. Debilitating sedation, commonly lamented by indica connoisseurs, is not a matter of contention for Pluto Kush, which thrives at providing instant physical relief while maintaining steady cerebral stimulation. The fluffy, soft flowers emanate a pungent aroma indicative of the strong, pleasant medicinal effects it administers.

highlightedReviews.text: A variety of Og kush.  It is said that the farther away from the sun the stronger the stain is, well I don't really care if that's true because this is one of my favorite strains.  Super strong effects that allow anyone to sleep easily and manage their pain.  Sleep is the best way to avoid the munchies.

Bought an HP of this strain. Had never had it but the deal was too good. Didnâ€™t try it till I busted open the vacuum bag. The aroma is a combination of Jack Hererâ€™s fruitiness with skunk. It is amazing. 

The effects are awesome and potent. Instant sedation. Think tranquilizer dart. And this is from a 1-2g/ day smoker. (3g on weekends ðŸ˜‘)

Whatâ€™s confusing is you can still speak and think. For a while. Itâ€™s pretty heady, but in large quantities (>1g) youâ€™re going to be pretty. Dopey.

Those are my favorite strains. And there arenâ€™t many out there.
